attributes.action: Immediately cease telling the British public that their first duty is protection of its people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Successive politicians continue to tell the media that their first duty is protection of its people. This has not and never has been the case. Successive governments have continued to encourage immigration and as a result have brought by their policies, terrorism into this country. This hypocricy is to be ended immediately
